version_description:
• Improved security for accessing protected folders from website

• Fixed an issue with Passcode screen where keyboard would disappear

• Improved Photo viewer where large photos would display slowly or cause the app to crash

• List/thu

• Improved Photo viewer where large photos would display slowly or cause the app to crash

• List/thu

• Fixes Decoy Passcode issue if it's identical to Launch Passcode
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

Pocket Files 3.0 is the biggest update ever with tons of new features and improvements:
- Complete redesign of the UI to make it even more easier to use
- Support for Messages. Now you can access and send your stored files from iMessage
- Show To

Pocket Files 3.0 is the biggest update ever with tons of new features and improvements:
- Complete redesign of the UI to make it even more easier to use
- Support for Messages. Now you can access and send your stored files from iMessage
- Show To
- Bug Fixes and various enhancements
- Bug Fixes and various enhancements

● Added Password recovery using email
● Saving photo back to Photos preserves the exif data and quality
● Fixed the location issue with Break-in photos
● Fixed a rare i

Pocket Files Pro 3.3 is mainly about customizing folders:
● Ability to assign a password for each folder
● Added sort by name, date and file size for each folder
● Ability to set grid or list view for each folder
● Added Save button to the tex

Pocket Files Pro 3.3 is mainly about customizing folders:
● Ability to assign a password for each folder
● Added sort by name, date and file size for each folder
● Ability to set grid or list view for each folder
● Added Save button to the tex

Improvements:
● Added Touch ID support for locked folders
● Ability to transfer files to decoy area via iTunes or WiFi sync
● Improved 3D Touch preview in Photos import
● Support iPad split view modes
● Added more options to sort files
●

This update introduces a private web browsing as well as fixing a bug that caused some older devices to crash:
◉ Added a brand new Tabbed Private Browsing (stay tuned for more improvements in the next versions :)
◉ Fixed issue with video thumbnails

This update introduces a private web browsing as well as fixing a bug that caused some older devices to crash:
◉ Added a brand new Tabbed Private Browsing (stay tuned for more improvements in the next versions :)
◉ Fixed issue with video thumbnails

◉ Select multiple photos quickly by swiping in Import Photos screen
◉ Ability to change homepage, clear cache and all data and more in web browser
◉ Ability to edit and delete bookmarks in web browser
◉ Ability to use iOS default media player
